parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the virus scan task ended. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InternetIp
parameters.description: The public IP address of the server.

parameters.name: IntranetIp
parameters.description: The private IP address of the server.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: RootTask
parameters.description: Specifies whether the virus scan task is the root task.

parameters.name: RootTaskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the root task.

>  You can call the [GetVirusScanLatestTaskStatistic](~~GetVirusScanLatestTaskStatistic~~) operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: ScanType
parameters.description:
The type of the virus scan task. Valid values:

*   **system**: automatic scan task
*   **user**: custom scan task

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the virus scan task started. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the virus scan task. Valid values:

*   **1**: running
*   **2**: complete
*   **3**: failed
*   **4**: timed out

parameters.name: StatusList
parameters.description: The statuses of virus scan tasks.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description:
The ID of the virus scan task.

>  You can call the [ListVirusScanTask](~~ListVirusScanTask~~) operation to query the ID.
